revision.revremark: Exchange translating Dutch and German of the tooltip

variable.tooltip: Stores consist address. Range 0-127 (direction set in bit 7)
variable.label: Advanced Consist Address
Indirizzo Consist Avanzato
Addresse UM
Verbundadresse
Adresa soupravy
Multitractie-adres
variable.tooltip: Stores consist address. Range 0-127 (direction set in bit 7)
Enthält die Verbundadresse. Grenzwerte 0-127. (Fahrtrichtung wird in Bit 7 gesetzt)
Obsahuje adresu soupravy. Meze 0-127 (směr je uložen v bitu 7)
Bevat het Multitractie-adres. Grenswaarden 0-127. (Rijrichting wordt gezet in bit 7)
This loco runs Normal(default) or Reversed(address+128) when in the consist
variable.label: Locomotive Direction In Consist
Direzione Loco nel Consist
Direction UM
Verbund-Richtung
Směr lokomotivy v soupravě
Rijrichting Multitractie
variable.tooltip: This loco runs Normal(default) or Reversed(address+128) when in the consist
Direzione loco nel Consist - Normale(default) o all'indietro (indirizzo+128)
Diese Lok fährt im Verbundbetrieb vorwärts (Default) oder rückwärts (Adresse + 128).
Pokud je tato lokomotiva v soupravě tak jede normálně (výchozí hodnota) nebo opačně (adresa + 128).
Deze loc rijd in Multitractie voorwaarts (standaard) of achterwaarts (adres + 128).
